textPlain: Original article: https://www.malwarebytes.com/blog/news/2025/08/adult-sites-t...The linked article just regurtitates the source.

Ars article is better. The interesting thing is they run code from svg. Ars also adds context how the same hole was used to hijack Microsoft accounts. Whereas Malwarebytes mostly makes it about clickjacking (and complains about age verification)
